ygData.msgSnippet: Ragnar looked at her as if she was insane. Ragnar: I don t care why you do not like humans, but may I remind you that you have a pulse on my scanners. Besides,

Ragnar looked at her as if she was insane.

Ragnar: I don't care why you do not like humans, but may I remind you
that you have a pulse on my scanners. Besides, I don't know how I got
to become as I am today.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Stacy <EmprzAnastazia@a...>"
<EmprzAnastazia@a...> wrote:
> 
> > Ragnar transformed so she could see he was no more transformer than
> > she was human. He then waved her to follow him.
> 
> She wasn't sure what to think of him.
> 
> She began to follow him.
> 
> > 
> > Ragnar: Unfortunately this is Earth... its prehistoric form in fact.
> > But I am no Autobot. My name is Ragnar and I am a human Star Colonel
> > in Clan Ghost Bear. It is a long story. Come now. The base is no 
> more
> > than a few hours away.
> 
> "A human?" her distaste reflected very clearly in her voice. "I'm 
> being guided & guarded.. by a flesh creature?!" This was an all time 
> low for her. She would get Alpha Trion for this. 
> 
> "Just get me there,... Human." she growled in distaste. She wished 
> she was in her old form, instead of this techno-organic form. She 
> would be there in only a few clicks. 
> 
> She transformed & followed him.
